resources.string: "Se ti è piaciuto Heriswap, spenderesti qualche secondo per lasciare una valutazione o un commento? grazie in anticipo."
"Attivare Swarm ×swarm_icon,1,1× per confrontare vostro punteggio con altri giocatori !"
"Sei molto forti, quindi, che ne dici aumentare un po la difficoltà?"
"Align at least 3 identical leaves ×feuille1,1,1× ×feuille1,1,1× ×feuille1,1,1×.\n\nSwap 2 neighbouring leaves ×feuille2,1,1× ×feuille3,1,1× to create a combination and earn points."
"The ×herisson_2_5,2,1.6× shows how much time is left, and the game is over when it reaches screen's right edge.\n\nThe ×feuille5,1,1× on its back scores bonus points."
"The goal is to score the most points.\n\nGame is time limited."
"Tap him to get a hint!\n\nFor each successful combination extra time is added. The best way to earn lot of time is to complete a level. This is done by clearing the top branch of all its leaves."

"The goal is to remove all the leaves ×feuille2,1,1× from the tree as fast as possible.

This is done by aligning at least 3 identical leaves ×feuille1,1,1× ×feuille1,1,1× ×feuille1,1,1×.

Swap 2 neighbouring leaves ×feuille2,1,1× ×feuille3,1,1× to create a combination."
"The ×herisson_2_5,2,1.6× shows the progress. Game is finished when it reaches screen's right edge.\n\nEvery combination using bonus type leaves ×feuille5,1,1× score double."
"The goal is to score the most points in exactly 100 seconds."
